body:
I like how she is doing Devil horns hand posture on Main Title page to curse the readers (Look up Church of Satan Devil horns)...Gotta love "These" artists...loved by the gods, and the nicest people on Earth to place a curse on you for taking the time to read and enjoy their Art.

If you want to know how serious it is, lets just say if you are a  spilling seed at the same time you are being cursed, it is possible the Curse will be magnified and can possibly kill you, or make you very sick or worse (Yes,worse). 

Anyone seeing this, you better ask God for forgiveness, and protection, Curses are very real
